text: Pieter Hielke Hofstra (24 September 1946 â€“ 2 January 2025) was a Dutch politician. As a member of the People's Party for Freedom and Democracy he served as a member of the House of Representatives from 1994 to 2006 and of the Senate from 2007 to 2011. As a member of the House of Representatives he was focused on housing and construction policy, and public transport and freight transport. As a member of the Senate he defended the interests of motorists and focused on public transport and the introduction of road pricing. He was chairman of . Hofstra died in Heerenveen on 2 January 2025, at the age of 78. ==References== Category:Dutch politicians Category:1946 births Category:2025 deaths Category:People from Groningen (city)
title: Pieter Hofstra
